Their leader hasn't been the same since he was kidnapped, and what's worse, there's a mole hiding in headquarters. Raz must use his powers to stop the mole before they execute their secret plan--to bring the murderous psychic villain, Maligula, back from the dead!<br></p></div><div class="col-start-1 col-end-last m-0 sm:col-start-2 sm:col-end--2 lg:col-3-15"><div class="relative w-full my :after block:after w-full:after absolute:after bottom-0:after border-top-2:after border-top-solid border-top-solid:after
